name: request-transformer
hubDesc: Modify the request before hitting the upstream server
description:
Transform the request sent by a client on the fly on Kong, before hitting the upstream server.Plugin performs the response transformation in following order

remove –> rename –> replace –> add –> append

fields.name: http_method
fields.help: Changes the HTTP method for the upstream request.

fields.name: remove.headers
fields.help: List of header names. Unset the header(s) with the given name.

fields.name: remove.querystring
fields.help: List of querystring names. Remove the querystring if it is present.

fields.name: remove.body
fields.help: List of parameter names. Remove the parameter if and only if content-type is one the following [application/json, multipart/form-data, application/x-www-form-urlencoded] and parameter is present.

fields.name: replace.headers
fields.help: List of headername:value pairs. If and only if the header is already set, replace its old value with the new one. Ignored if the header is not already set.

fields.name: replace.querystring
fields.help: List of queryname:value pairs. If and only if the field name is already set, replace its old value with the new one. Ignored if the field name is not already set.

fields.name: rename.headers
fields.help: List of headername:value pairs. If and only if the header is already set, rename the header. The value is unchanged. Ignored if the header is not already set.

fields.name: rename.querystring
fields.help: List of queryname:value pairs. If and only if the field name is already set, rename the field name. The value is unchanged. Ignored if the field name is not already set.

fields.name: rename.body
fields.help: List of parameter name:value pairs. Rename the parameter name if and only if content-type is one the following [application/json, multipart/form-data, application/x-www-form-urlencoded] and parameter is present.

fields.name: replace.body
fields.help: List of paramname:value pairs. If and only if content-type is one the following [application/json, multipart/form-data, application/x-www-form-urlencoded] and the parameter is already present, replace its old value with the new one. Ignored if the parameter is not already present.

fields.name: add.headers
fields.help: List of headername:value pairs. If and only if the header is not already set, set a new header with the given value. Ignored if the header is already set.

fields.name: add.querystring
fields.help: List of queryname:value pairs. If and only if the querystring is not already set, set a new querystring with the given value. Ignored if the header is already set.

fields.name: add.body
fields.help: List of pramname:value pairs. If and only if content-type is one the following [application/json, multipart/form-data, application/x-www-form-urlencoded] and the parameter is not present, add a new parameter with the given value to form-encoded body. Ignored if the parameter is already present.

fields.name: append.headers
fields.help: List of headername:value pairs. If the header is not set, set it with the given value. If it is already set, an additional new header with the same name and the new value will be appended.

fields.name: append.querystring
fields.help: List of queryname:value pairs. If the querystring is not set, set it with the given value. If it is already set, a new querystring with the same name and the new value will be set.

fields.name: append.body
fields.help: List of paramname:value pairs. If the content-type is one the following [application/json, application/x-www-form-urlencoded], add a new parameter with the given value if the parameter is not present, otherwise if it is already present, the two values (old and new) will be aggregated in an array.
